    • Method Detail

      • createAttribute

        public static org.apache.jena.rdf.model.Resource createAttribute(org.apache.jena.rdf.model.Resource root,
                                                                 org.apache.jena.rdf.model.Resource attributeClass,
                                                                 Object value)
        Attach an attribute to the root node according to the SIO scheme. Specifically, create a structure that looks like this: root [ has attribute (SIO_000008) [ rdf:type $attributeClass has value (SIO_000300) $value ] ]
        Parameters:
        root - the root resource
        attributeClass - the type of attribute to create
        value - the value of the attribute
        Returns:
        the created attribute node

      • createAttribute

        public static org.apache.jena.rdf.model.Resource createAttribute(org.apache.jena.rdf.model.Resource root,
                                                                 org.apache.jena.rdf.model.Property p,
                                                                 org.apache.jena.rdf.model.Resource attributeClass,
                                                                 Object value)
        Attach an attribute to the root node according to the SIO scheme. Specifically, create a structure that looks like this: root [ $p, subProperty of 'has attribute' (SIO_000008) [ rdf:type $attributeClass 'has value' (SIO_000300) $value ] ]
        Parameters:
        root - the root resource
        p - some sub-property of 'has attribute' (SIO_000008)
        attributeClass - the type of attribute to create
        value - the value of the attribute
        Returns:
        the created attribute node

      • getAttributeValues

        public static Collection<String> getAttributeValues(org.apache.jena.rdf.model.Resource root,
                                                    org.apache.jena.rdf.model.Resource attributeClass)
        Get all attribute values of the given root node that are strings and that belong to the given attribute class. The root node, attribute node, attribute type, and attribute class are related by the following structure: root [ $p, subProperty of 'has attribute' (SIO_000008) [ rdf:type $attributeClass 'has value' (SIO_000300) $value ] ]
        Parameters:
        root - the root resource
        attributeClass - the type of attribute
        Returns:
        all String attribute values of the root node that belong to the given attribute class

      • getAttributeValues

        public static Collection<String> getAttributeValues(org.apache.jena.rdf.model.Resource root,
                                                    org.apache.jena.rdf.model.Property p,
                                                    org.apache.jena.rdf.model.Resource attributeClass)
        Get all attribute values of the given root node that are strings and that belong to the given attribute class. The root node, attribute node, attribute type, and attribute class are related by the following structure: root [ $p, subProperty of 'has attribute' (SIO_000008) [ rdf:type $attributeClass 'has value' (SIO_000300) $value ] ]
        Parameters:
        root - the root resource
        attributeClass - the type of attribute
        Returns:
        all String attribute values of the root node that belong to the given attribute class

        public static org.apache.jena.rdf.model.Resource getSequenceType(org.apache.jena.rdf.model.Resource sequenceNode)
